DOC.brief_summary: In postpartum hospitalize woman , delay morning round improve patient satisfaction ?
DOC.brief_title: Timing Morning Rounds Postpartum Hospitalized Women
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVE To investigate timing physician round patient satisfaction STUDY DESIGN Randomized , control , quality improvement trial OUTCOMES Primary : score Hospital Consumer Assessment Healthcare Provers Systems ( HCAPS ) survey Secondary : score Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale
DOC.criteria: Delivered 0600 0000 Admitted Memorial Hermann postpartum unit Patient manage University Texas Physicians Group and/or obstetricsgynecology resident None
